document.heading: Removal and Disposition of Abandoned and Other Unlawfully Parked Vehicles Reform Act of 2003

history.narrative: Law 15-35, the “Removal and Disposition of Abandoned and Other Unlawfully Parked Vehicles Reform Act of 2003”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-78, which was referred to Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 3, 2003, and July 8, 2003, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 29, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 15-113 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-35 became effective on October 28, 2003.
